channel.title: Microsoft Word
channel.description:
[b]Microsoft Word.[/b]
Hey. I tried to open this program, and it kept sending me the message, "This modification is not allowed because the document is locked." So, I looked around and couldn't seem to find any way of unlocking it. I went to help, and read what Microsoft had to say. Well, they didn't explain how to unlock the document, put it that way.
So, has anyone got any ideas as to how I can unlock this program?

item.title: Microsoft Word
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Just copy all of it and paste into a new document.

Read full topic
